full_text: MATERIALS 2 balls of Purl Soho’s Pouf , 50% alpaca and 50% Andean highland wool. Each ball of this super bulky-weight yarn is approximately 108 yards/ 100 grams; approximately 175 yards required. We used the colors Crocus Bud, Golden Green, and High Tide. US 11 (8 mm), 16-inch circular knitting needles A stitch marker A US 13 (9 mm) or US 15 (10 mm) knitting needle , any type, for binding off GAUGE 11 stitches and 15 rounds = 4 inches in stockinette stitch SIZE Finished Circumference at Bottom: 22½ inches Finished Circumference at Top: 19½ inches Finished Height: 21 inches Designed by Purl Soho designer, Hiromi Glover . See even more of Hiromi’s work on her Instagram !
name: Ravelry: Cozy Up Cowl pattern by Purl Soho
